ci:setup.description: Sets up an org as the target of a continuous integration pipeline
examples: $ sfdx ci:setup --targetusername myOrg@example.com --name "Continuous Integration App" --permissionsetname "Admin Access"

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

name.name: name
name.description: name of the connected app to create

permissionsetname.name: permissionsetname
permissionsetname.description: name of the permission set that will determine which users have access to the connected app. If not provided, the permission set will have the same name as the connected app. In either case, the permission set is created if it doesn't exist yet.

certfile.name: certfile
certfile.description: path to the X.509 certificate to configure the connected app to use for authentication

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: path to which the X.509 certificate and private key file will be written
